definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: The most interesting thing was that there are two red bridal sedan chairs in the front door.
sentences.chinese: 最有趣的是，在前門有兩個紅色的新娘花轎。

sentences.english: She left a suicide note let shu ping sedan must go, never back to the high house.
sentences.chinese: 她留下遺書讓淑萍花轎來了一定要走，永不再回邱家。

sentences.english: Eight men carried the sedan chair on their shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 八名男子進行他們的肩膀上花轎。

sentences.english: The bridal sedan is the core of the traditional wedding.
sentences.chinese: 花轎是傳統婚禮的核心內容之一。

sentences.english: I can not forget is that the sedan chair sitting in the drive when Luoyang.
sentences.chinese: 我忘不了的，是坐着花轎在洛陽兜風的時候。

sentences.english: Having said, pulling a crown into the sedan chair in show.
sentences.chinese: 說罷，一把拉住冠秀塞進花轎裏。

sentences.english: It is worthing seeing for the models of a wedding sedan and a real wedding bed in Yangliuqing.
sentences.chinese: 楊柳青值得一看的是仿造的結婚花轎和真正的婚牀。

sentences.english: Let Zhang Jian carried the sedan to Xu house second days.
sentences.chinese: 第二天就讓張吉安擡着花轎去徐家提親。

definition: to ride the dragon/to die (of emperors and kings)
altar lamp burning day and night
not to glance sideways (idiom)/to gaze fixedly/to be fully concentrated/to preserve a correct attitude
to gesticulate/to make lively gestures (while talking)/also written 比手劃腳|比手划脚
full moon/first full moon after birth (i.e. entering the second month)
